original_text: Which was the son of Cainan, which was the son of Arphaxad, which was the son of Sem, which was the son of Noe, which was the son of Lamech,
korean_text: 그 위는 가이난이요 그 위는 아박삿이요 그 위는 셈이요 그 위는 노아요 그 위는 레멕이요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Cainan,
which was the son of Arphaxad,
which was the son of Sem,
which was the son of Noe,
which was the son of Lamech,
